title: China under communism
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, John T. Bobbitt and Milan Herzog
brief_description: The changes in China today (1959); China’s most critical social and economic problems, and her position in world strategy. To obtain this material, author, editor and foreign correspondent, John Strohm, who first visited China in 1937, returned there in 1958 and travelled over 7,500 miles almost entirely without restriction, observing and photographing all phases of Chinese life.
